nodes.bodyText: I might be missing some subtlety that required using the old version of the code with its own timings instead of Armeria's, let me know.
what you've done is fine. As long as the metric name/dimension matches, it is better to reuse armeria's duration because we don't do much besides invoke a controller anyway.
ps 0.98.3 is out you can just push master on that if you like
